Sunday.name: Sunflower Seeds
Sunday.description: Edible seeds from the sunflower plant, often roasted and salted, used as a snack or ingredient in various dishes.

Monday.name: Molasses
Monday.description: A thick, dark syrup produced during the sugar-making process, known for its rich, sweet, and slightly bitter flavor.

Tuesday.name: Tuna
Tuesday.description: A saltwater fish widely consumed for its firm, pink flesh, popular in cooked dishes or preserved as canned tuna.

Wednesday.name: Weetabix
Wednesday.description: A wholegrain wheat breakfast cereal, shaped into compact, rectangular biscuits, known for its high fiber content.

Thursday.name: Thyme
Thursday.description: A fragrant herb with small, green leaves, used for seasoning a wide range of dishes, offering a slightly minty and lemony flavor.

Friday.name: Fries (Frozen)
Friday.description: Pre-cut potatoes, blanched and frozen, designed for convenient cooking to achieve a crispy exterior and fluffy interior.

Saturday.name: Salmon
Saturday.description: A popular fatty fish, distinguished by its pink to orange flesh, enjoyed for its rich flavor and high omega-3 fatty acid content.
